_header: All that leven in God listeneth to my lore
_description: A blessing in the Speculum Sacerdotale — one couplet

BodRawA362.Transcription:
Alle þat lyuen in god lysteneþ to my loreI ȝeue
                    ȝou alle my benysoun boþe lasse & more et cetera

BLAdd36791.Transcription:
Alle þat leuen in god lystneþ to my loreI yeve yow alle my
                    beneson bothe lasse and more et cetera
